TH34.name: TH-34
TH34.description:
<c=aaaaaa>TH-34</c>
A common warehouse workbot reprogrammed for combat. Can switch between a <c=keyword>battle form</c> that generates <c=downside>heat</c>, and a <c=keyword>defense form</c> that removes it.

SilverCoils.name: SILVER COILS
SilverCoils.description: The first time you <c=downside>overheat</c> each combat, <c=heal>heal 1</c> and gain 1 <c=status>HEAT CAPACITY</c>.

CodeBlue.name: CODE BLUE
CodeBlue.description: Draw <c=action>+1 card</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>.

ElectronDonor.name: ELECTRON DONOR
ElectronDonor.description:
If you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c> and less than 
-2 <c=status>HEAT</c>, attacks deal +1 damage.

MechanicalHeart.name: MECHANICAL HEART
MechanicalHeart.description: Whenever you gain <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> or <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, gain 1 more.

IonBattery.name: ION BATTERY
IonBattery.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> the first time you gain or lose <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c> every turn.

Calculator.name: CALCULATOR
Calculator.description: If you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, card draw on all of Riggs' cards are increased by 1.

MagneticField.name: MAGNETIC FIELD
MagneticField.description: Whenever you gain or lose <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, gain or lose twice as much <c=status>SHIELD CAPACITY</c>.

WireCutters.name: WIRE CUTTERS
WireCutters.description: If you hold <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> for 5 turns in a row without losing any, convert it into <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

WirelessCharging.name: WIRELESS CHARGING
WirelessCharging.description: While you have <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>, <c=midrow>attack drones</c>, <c=midrow>missiles</c>, and <c=midrow>space mines</c> deal <c=damage>+1 damage</c>.

SilverLining.name: SILVER LINING
SilverLining.description: If you have 3 or less hull, <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> gives 1 less <c=status>HEAT</c> per attack.

TaskManager.name: TASK MANAGER
TaskManager.description: While you have <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, all cards with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> cost 1 less <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.

Golemancy.name: GOLEMANCY
Golemancy.description: If you have any <c=status>SHARD</c>, <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> removes <c=status>SHARD</c> instead of adding <c=status>HEAT</c>. If you have -3 <c=status>HEAT</c>, <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c> gives <c=status>SHARD</c> instead of removing <c=status>HEAT</c>.

BitFlip.name: BITFLIP
BitFlip.description: Whenever you play a <c=card>basic card</c>, swap all <c=status>MINUS</c> and <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>.

ElectroStimuli.name: ELECTRO-STIMULI
ElectroStimuli.description: Increase the value of X on all cards by the amount of <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> you have.<c=downside> When playing a card with an X value, gain <c=status>HEAT</c> equal to your <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>.</c>

LockUp.name: LOCK-UP
LockUp.description: <c=downside>While you have <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, you cannot move</c>, but attacks deals <c=damage>+1 damage</c>.

Binary.name: BINARY
Binary.description: While you have <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, <c=keyword>A upgraded</c> cards deal 1 more damage. While you have <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>, <c=keyword>B upgraded</c> cards deal 1 more damage.

PositronBomb.name: POSITRON BOMB
PositronBomb.description: While you have <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>, blastwave does <c=damage>+1 damage</c>.<c=downside> Gain an additional 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> when triggering blastwave while you have <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>.</c>

InPersonAutopilot.name: IN-PERSON AUTOPILOT
InPersonAutopilot.description: At the start of every turn, if you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>AUTOPILOT</c>.

PlusCharge.name: PLUS CHARGE
PlusCharge.description: Attacks do <c=keyword>{0}</c> more damage. Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>HEAT</c> after every attack.

MinusCharge.name: MINUS CHARGE
MinusCharge.description: Attacks do <c=keyword>{0}</c> less damage. Lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>HEAT</c> after every card played. <c=status>HEAT</c> can be reduced to -3.

Optimize.name: OPTIMIZE
Optimize.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>.

OptimizeB.name: OPTIMIZE B
OptimizeB.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>.
